attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: People are stupid these days. The leader said that in the 21st century we shouldn't be relying on pieces of paper being sent around the country. Well done what an observation I could have made that observation too. But I can't come up with an alternative because that is not my job. We are run by imbeciles how frustrating. What about school trips. How can we send children with cash into school. People in the REAL  world use cheques!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
